creator: yoda3d
title: Bad kent
description: This project involves creating a "Bad Kent" model using 3D modeling software, 3D printing it, and applying acrylic paint for finishing. The final product is a physical representation of the digital model.
steps: Model "Bad Kent" in 3D software and export it to STL format. Model dimensions are x: 63.8mm, y: 45.47mm, and z: 100mm.
3D print the model with the following settings: layer thickness of 0.15mm, hollow filling, and no support. The printing time is approximately 4 hours.
Apply acrylic paint to the printed model for finishing.
The final product is available at: https://moon-station.mechamoon.com/index.php/produit/bad-kent/
